Class ProjectFilterService

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.service.ProjectFilterService
public class ProjectFilterService extends Object
Service class for filtering and sorting BTO projects based on various criteria.

    • applyFilters

      public List<BTOProj> applyFilters(List<BTOProj> projects, List<FilterOption> filters)
      Applies a list of filters to the given list of BTO projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of eligible projects to filter
      filters - the list of filters to apply
      Returns:
      the filtered list of projects

    • setDateRange

      public void setDateRange(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Sets the date range filter for project closing dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date
      endDate - the end date

      public void setPriceRange(double minPrice, double maxPrice)

      Parameters:
      minPrice - the minimum price
      maxPrice - the maximum price
